cause.description:
Mother Nature has been the catalyst for more deaths in human history than anything else. We must take action immediately to defeat her.
1. Drive more, if you drive a hybrid...tow something at all times, only travel uphill
2. Turn your A/C down, have winter themed parties.
3. Practice slash and burn farming in your back yard
4. Pave your front yard
5. only breathe out
cause.mission: Destroy the Earth before we die
cause.name: Defeat Mother Nature!
